titles.title: Chiropractors Equity Act
Chiropractors Equity Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to allow chiropractors to provide items and services through private contracts under the Medicare program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Chiropractors Equity Act - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to allow chiropractors to provide items and services through private contracts.
